stimulusHtml: The Maclaurin series for  1 1 − x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CC9@  is  ∑ n = 0 ∞ x n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4193@ . Which of the following is a power series expansion for  x 2 1 − x 2 ? MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FF2@
choicesHtml: 1 + x 2 + x 4 + x 6 + x 8 + ⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4876@

x 2 + x 3 + x 4 + x 5 + ⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46D3@

x 2 + 2 x 3 + 3 x 4 + 4 x 5 + ⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@490A@

x 2 + x 4 + x 6 + x 8 + ⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46D9@

x 2 − x 4 + x 6 − x 8 + ⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46EF@
